item.title: Managed Web Application Hosting
item.description:
You might want to utilize popular web applications for your business, but the technical hurdles of hosting, software updates, and maintenance can feel overwhelming, especially without a dedicated IT team. There’s a solution: managed web applications. This service takes the burden of hardware and software management off your plate, effectively acting as your IT department. Similar to cloud computing, everything is handled externally for a recurring fee. Myhosting.com specializes in managed web applications, offering standard hosting services along with specialized business solutions...

item.title: The free WooCommerce WordPress plugin has reached 4 million downloads
item.description:

WooCommerce is WooThemes’ free flagship product, officially partnered with companies like Amazon, Mastercard, and PayPal. Source: WooThemes website. WooCommerce enables businesses to operate e-commerce sites using WordPress as their content management system. WooThemes uses a freemium model.
